Name: Tequila Basil Lemonade
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and gently stir.
Review: Just as it says on the tin, tequila charged with lemonade and flavoured with basil.
